DOC.detailed_description: Background : Defining molecular profile ( gene protein expression ) normal breast tissue essential identifying marker cellular subtypes normal human breast . These marker could serve biomarkers prevention trial represent new therapeutic target also express early breast cancer . The gene protein expression normal breast tissue may dependent stage menstrual cycle , whether woman pre- post-menopausal , prior pregnancy breast feed history , age . The molecular profile metastatic breast tumor may differ primary tumor differ metastasis different anatomic site . Similarly , isolation characterization breast cancer stem cell could provide new approach treatment prevention breast cancer .
